Improvements.Improvement: Use Java Optional class to avoid NullPointerException
Improvements.Description: Java Optional class can be used to represent nullable object references. It can help to avoid NullPointerException which is common when dealing with null in Java.

Improvements.Improvement: Use HashSet instead of ArrayList for sessionTypes and sessionNames
Improvements.Description: When checking for duplicate values, a HashSet is more efficient than an ArrayList. A HashSet has constant time performance for the basic operations (add, remove, contains and size), assuming the hash function disperses the elements properly among the buckets.

Improvements.Improvement: Use enhanced for loop instead of traditional for loop
Improvements.Description: Instead of using a traditional for loop to iterate over `subSessionProfiles`, use an enhanced for loop.
